title: Woke up to my Pixel 2 trying to reboot. Multi-colored error popped up saying my data may be corrupt
content: Woke up to my Pixel 2 trying to reboot. Multi-colored error popped up saying my data may be corrupt and require a factory reset. Warning gave 2 choices: tey again or reset to factory settings and eliminating all my data. I tried again and the rebooting worked. How should I take care of this?
